players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Charlie: "I am the mafioso and I killed Bob last night. Keep an eye on Diana, she seems suspicious."
You: "I think we should lynch Diana, she seems suspicious. I also want to investigate Charlie's alibi for the time Bob was killed."
Diana: "Hello everyone, I think we should investigate Charlie's alibi before making any decisions. We can't just lynch someone based on suspicion alone."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
